sentences: Jameson Clark (born 1972 in Starr, South Carolina) is an American country music singer.
section: N/A

sentences: Between 2001 and 2002, he recorded for Capitol Records and charted two singles: "Don't Play Any Love Songs" and "You da Man", in addition to releasing an album titled Workin' on a Groove.
section: N/A

sentences: Ray Waddell of Billboard magazine gave Workin' on a Groove a mostly-positive review, saying that Clark "is having himself a good ol' time".
section: N/A

sentences: It also received a positive review from Matt Bjorke of About.com, who compared Clark's sound to Dwight Yoakam, Toby Keith, and Hank Williams III.
section: N/A
